You should get some sleep. I lost my shit at one point and suffered through some of the things that you described. Not sleeping was a huge part of it. Good quality sleep is by far the most important thing you can do for yourself. Second would be diet, and third exercise. Learning how to meditate really helped me quiet my mind too. But you really need to sleep.
